verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w abide|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* tent? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*?

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w who|strong="H6664"\w* \w walks|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w integrity|strong="H8549"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* practices \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, \w who|strong="H6664"\w* \w speaks|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* truth \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*,

\w who|strong="H7138"\w* \w has|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w slander|strong="H7270"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \w who|strong="H7138"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w who|strong="H7138"\w* casts \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w scorn|strong="H2781"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*,

\w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w despises|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* vile \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w honors|strong="H3513"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* revise \w a|strong="H3068"\w* costly \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*,

\w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w lends|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w interest|strong="H5392"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* refuses \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribe|strong="H7810"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*.
